title: Countries with the highest rates of autism among children worldwide as of 2018
yAxis: Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied for 10 number of Countrys.
Country United States has the highest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied and Portugal has the lowest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied.
There is a difference of 158.8 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Portugal.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied for 10 number of Countrys.
Country United States has the highest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied and Portugal has the lowest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied.
There is a difference of 158.8 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Portugal.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied and Portugal has the lowest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied.
The difference of Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied between the highest and lowest Country is 158.8.
Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied at Country United States is 168.0 , second place is Japan at 161.0, and thirdly is Canada at 152.0.
Country United Kingdom, and Ireland share the same value 100.0.
The Country United States tends to be 1.86 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 902.2.
